snippet.title: Portal 2 Coop Trailer HD
snippet.description:
Check out Bas Rutten's Liver Shot on MMA Surge: http://bit.ly/MMASurgeEp1
This is a trailer showcasing the Cooperative aspect in the first-person puzzle game, Portal 2, due out in February 2011.

Developer: Valve Software
Platforms: PC, Xbox 360, PS3
Release date: February 9, 2011

http://www.mahalo.com/portal-2
http://www.mahalo.com/portal-2-trailer
